description: Rada Miskovic receives photographs and notes from a trusted contact about a hidden basement room discovered by maintenance. Files suggest unauthorized BCI experiments tied to the Directorate.
Rada verifies the evidence, consults with grassroots citizen leaders, and prepares a broadcast. She decides to expose the Directorate’s abuses, prioritizing demands for accountability.

Rada’s special broadcast reveals the Directorate’s secret override chamber, linking it to unauthorized BCI experiments and implicating them in Halden’s downfall. Footage triggers citywide outrage and protest.
Council launches an emergency internal review. Directorate members are confronted over evidence of secret system controls and suspected role in destabilizing BCI and Halden’s death.
Inspired by Rada’s exposé, grassroots groups organize mass protests demanding the Directorate's removal and full disclosure of BCI abuses. Council splits deepen as calls for reform intensify.
